attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible! It is the worst designed platform i have ever seen! If you have any dignity for your self then you will not download this app!
attributes.title: 0/10 would NOT recommend 🤮

attributes.review: Sorry this has got to be one of the worst apps I’ve ever downloaded - so laggy and so glitchy it really should just be taken down immediately and never replaced 🧚🏼❤️🌺
attributes.title: It’s a no from me 😌✨

attributes.review: This app should not be allowed to have the company of such amazing others such as temple run and subway surfers when all it helped me to run and surf to is a possible continuation of this country’s insanity.

attributes.review: This downloads a virus to your phone called the trump virus. I downloaded this and my phone began to overheat and glitch. Horribly glitches your device until you delete.
attributes.title: Downloads virus!!

attributes.review: This app makes your whole phone screen Orange and also it makes your phone very very slow and it’s just a very stupid app who would even get this app.
attributes.title: Horrible app!

attributes.review: This app is so bad that I can even describe it. Like I don’t know what happened but after I downloaded it everything on my phone started glitching. It kinda like this app is as a app as he is as a president complete garBITCH.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I was excited to get this app so I could see my chetto president, but then I see my mom’s best friends sisters daughter looking vampire, I will forever be traumatized and will not recommend this app to anyone who will feel such shock. I am very heartbroken😭😩✨🔥🤔🤩👄👁✨.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!

attributes.review: i was sitting at home one day then trump came knocking on my door and told me to get the app so i did. my pet emoji wasn’t too happy about it. he turned all red and exploded and now i don’t have a house just because of this app! my pet llama came to the rescue except trump had already hurt my llama so it couldn’t ride it. at the end of the day i was walking alone with my llama no where to go. moral of the story don’t get this app!
attributes.title: terrible app!

attributes.review: My phone is barely a year old and it’s already messing up so much after just a week of having this app??? Are you kidding me? Ridiculous!!!
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: Worst possible app!!! I downloaded it and it killed my dog and my whole family, and made me lose my home. Don’t get it unless you want to lose your family and your home! >:(
attributes.title: AWFUL
